title: Sketches of Chinese Customs & Manners, In 1811-12, taken on the spot
creator: Wilkinson, George
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Wilkinson, George: Sketches of Chinese Customs & Manners, In 1811-12, taken on the spot  and interspersed with a variety of curious occurrences, during A Voyage to the Cape of Good Hope, Pulo Penang, China, Canton, Whampoa, and Saint Helena ; with some account of the Ladrones ; in a series of letters to a friend at Palermo, and dedicated to Sir George Staunton, Bart.. Bath  Berlin
publisher: Printed by J. Browne  Staatsbibliothek zu Berlin – Preußischer Kulturbesitz, Germany
alternative: and interspersed with a variety of curious occurrences, during A Voyage to the Cape of Good Hope, Pulo Penang, China, Canton, Whampoa, and Saint Helena ; with some account of the Ladrones ; in a series of letters to a friend at Palermo, and dedicated to Sir George Staunton, Bart.
